title: User Registration with Email and Password
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully using a valid email and password and completes profile setup.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page.
Input a valid email address and password.
Submit registration form.
Confirm user receives email verification prompt.
Complete email verification.
Confirm user is prompted to complete profile setup.
Complete profile fields with valid data.
Verify successful registration completion and user is redirected to homepage.

title: User Login with Google OAuth
description: Verify that a user can login successfully using Google OAuth.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Click on Google OAuth login button.
Authenticate via Google OAuth popup.
Confirm user is logged in and redirected to homepage.

title: Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify that login fails with incorrect email or password and appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Input incorrect email or password.
Click login button.
Verify login failure and error message is displayed.

title: Search Listings with Location and Category Filters
description: Verify that the search returns correct listings filtered by user-selected location, category, and price range.

steps.description: Navigate to homepage or search page.
Enter search keywords and select category.
Set location filter via location selector.
Set price range filter.
Submit search query.
Verify search results only include listings matching filters and correct pagination is applied.

title: Search with 'Near Me' Radius Filter Using Geolocation
description: Verify that the 'Near Me' filter returns listings within the specified radius based on user geolocation using Haversine distance.

steps.description: Allow geolocation permission for the app.
Select 'Near Me' filter and set radius (e.g., 5 km).
Submit search.
Verify returned listings are within the specified radius according to computed geolocation distance.

title: Create New Listing with Category-Specific Form Fields
description: Verify that a listing owner can create a new listing with required fields tailored to the selected category (property, vehicle, electronics, business).

steps.description: Login as listing owner.
Navigate to create listing page.
Select category (e.g., vehicle).
Fill in all required form fields specific to the category.
Upload images with compression.
Submit listing.
Verify listing creation success, with all fields correctly saved and images compressed.

title: Fail Listing Creation with Invalid Data Inputs
description: Verify that the create listing form validates inputs using Zod schemas and shows real-time validation errors for invalid or missing required data.

steps.description: Navigate to create listing page.
Select category.
Enter invalid data or leave required fields blank.
Verify that validation messages appear for incorrect or missing fields in real-time.
Attempt to submit form.
Confirm submission is blocked and errors persist.

title: View Listing Details Including Images, Pricing, and Reviews
description: Verify a user can view listing details including image gallery, pricing markers, verified badges, and aggregated reviews.

steps.description: Browse to a listing details page.
Check images are displayed with gallery navigation and optimized loading.
Check pricing markers are clear and accurate.
Verify presence of verified listing badges if applicable.
Verify reviews are displayed with ratings and user comments.

title: Add Listing to Favorites and Remove
description: Verify that logged-in users can add listings to their favorites and remove them successfully.

steps.description: Login as user.
Navigate to a listing.
Click 'Add to Favorites' button.
Verify listing is added to favorites list.
Remove the listing from favorites.
Verify listing is removed from favorites list.

title: Contact Listing Owner and Lead Creation Verification
description: Verify that when a user contacts a listing owner (via chat or call), a new lead is auto-created and linked correctly on the owner's dashboard.

steps.description: Login as user.
Navigate to a listing.
Initiate contact via chat or call.
Verify that a new lead is created and owner receives notification.
Login as listing owner.
Open lead management dashboard.
Verify the new lead is present with accurate details.

title: Update Lead Status and Add Notes
description: Verify listing owners can update lead statuses and add notes in the CRM system and changes are properly saved and displayed.

steps.description: Login as listing owner.
Open lead management dashboard.
Select a lead and update status to a different stage.
Add notes to the lead.
Save updates.
Verify lead status and notes are updated and persist on reload.

title: Create and Manage Ad Campaign with Analytics Tracking
description: Verify listing owners can create an ad campaign with custom parameters and track impressions and clicks accurately through real-time analytics.

steps.description: Login as listing owner.
Navigate to campaign creation page.
Fill campaign form with valid details and submit.
Verify campaign is created successfully and visible in campaigns dashboard.
Simulate user clicks and impressions on sponsored listings.
Verify campaign analytics reflect real-time updated impressions and clicks.

title: Write Eligible Review and Enforce One Review per User
description: Verify that only eligible users can write reviews after interaction, and only one review per user per listing/business is allowed with moderation.

steps.description: Login as eligible user who completed interaction with listing.
Navigate to write a review for a listing.
Submit a valid review.
Verify review submission is successful and displayed after moderation.
Attempt to submit a second review for the same listing.
Verify submission is blocked and an error message is shown.
Login as ineligible user without prior interaction.
Attempt to submit a review.
Verify user is prevented from submitting a review with an eligibility error.

title: Report Listings and Users with Admin Moderation Workflow
description: Verify users can report listings and users, admins receive and review these reports and enforce actions (warnings, suspensions, bans).

steps.description: Login as user.
Navigate to listing or user profile to report.
Submit a report with valid details.
Verify report is logged in system.
Login as admin.
Open admin reports dashboard.
Review report and take enforcement action.
Verify user/listing status is updated accordingly (warning, suspension, ban).

title: Real-Time Chat Messaging with Lead Linkage
description: Verify users and listing owners can communicate through real-time chat that maintains history and correctly links messages to leads.

steps.description: Login as user.
Initiate chat with listing owner.
Send message in chat.
Verify message appears in real-time on owner side.
Login as listing owner.
Verify chat history is visible and linked to corresponding lead.

title: Admin Dashboard Role-Based Access Control
description: Verify that admin users have access only to allowed management features based on their roles and permissions.

steps.description: Login as admin user with limited permissions.
Attempt to access various admin dashboard modules (users, listings, reports, campaigns).
Verify access is granted only to permitted modules.
Login as super admin.
Verify full access to all dashboard areas.

title: Mobile App Location, Camera, and Sharing Permissions and Features
description: Verify that the mobile app correctly requests and handles native permissions for GPS, camera, and sharing features and integrates with Capacitor.

steps.description: Install and launch mobile app.
Verify app requests permission for location access.
Grant location permission.
Verify app can access and display user location.
Navigate to listing image upload feature.
Verify app requests camera and gallery access permissions.
Capture or select image and upload.
Verify image is compressed and uploaded successfully.
Use sharing feature on a listing.
Verify native sharing dialog appears and shares listing link.

title: Performance Benchmark Testing with Lighthouse
description: Verify that the web application meets performance benchmarks with Lighthouse scores of at least 90 for Performance, SEO, Accessibility and load time less than 2 seconds.

steps.description: Run Lighthouse performance audit on homepage.
Verify Performance score ≥ 90.
Verify SEO score ≥ 90.
Verify Accessibility score ≥ 90.
Verify load time is under 2 seconds on standard network.

title: Security Enforcement of Row Level Security on APIs and Data
description: Verify that row level security policies and appropriate data access control are enforced across database tables and APIs preventing unauthorized data access.

steps.description: Attempt to access listings and leads as an unauthenticated user.
Verify unauthorized access is denied.
Login as normal user and attempt to access another user's leads or private data.
Verify access to other users' private data is denied.

title: Map View with Zillow-Style Clustering and Price Markers
description: Verify map view displays clustered listings with accurate price markers and updates in real-time as filters are changed.

steps.description: Navigate to map view page.
Verify listings are displayed as price markers with clustering when zoomed out.
Apply filters such as category and price range.
Verify map updates listings and clusters accordingly in real-time.
Zoom in and out on map.
Verify clusters dynamically update based on zoom level.
